- arrow\_backCLI Reference

This site uses cookies from Google to deliver its services and to analyze traffic.

[Learn more](https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies) Ok, Got it

| Command | Alias | Description |
| :-- | :-- | :-- |
| [`add`](https://angular.dev/cli/add) |  | Adds support for an external library to your project. |
| [`analytics`](https://angular.dev/cli/analytics) |  | Configures the gathering of Angular CLI usage metrics. |
| [`build`](https://angular.dev/cli/build) | `b` | Compiles an Angular application or library into an output directory named dist/ at the given output path. |
| [`cache`](https://angular.dev/cli/cache) |  | Configure persistent disk cache and retrieve cache statistics. |
| [`completion`](https://angular.dev/cli/completion) |  | Set up Angular CLI autocompletion for your terminal. |
| [`config`](https://angular.dev/cli/config) |  | Retrieves or sets Angular configuration values in the angular.json file for the workspace. |
| [`deploy`](https://angular.dev/cli/deploy) |  | Invokes the deploy builder for a specified project or for the default project in the workspace. |
| [`e2e`](https://angular.dev/cli/e2e) | `e` | Builds and serves an Angular application, then runs end-to-end tests. |
| [`extract-i18n`](https://angular.dev/cli/extract-i18n) |  | Extracts i18n messages from source code. |
| [`generate`](https://angular.dev/cli/generate) | `g` | Generates and/or modifies files based on a schematic. |
| [`lint`](https://angular.dev/cli/lint) |  | Runs linting tools on Angular application code in a given project folder. |
| [`new`](https://angular.dev/cli/new) | `n` | Creates a new Angular workspace. |
| [`run`](https://angular.dev/cli/run) |  | Runs an Architect target with an optional custom builder configuration defined in your project. |
| [`serve`](https://angular.dev/cli/serve) | `s`, `dev` | Builds and serves your application, rebuilding on file changes. |
| [`test`](https://angular.dev/cli/test) | `t` | Runs unit tests in a project. |
| [`update`](https://angular.dev/cli/update) |  | Updates your workspace and its dependencies. See [https://angular.dev/update-guide/](https://angular.dev/update-guide/). |
| [`version`](https://angular.dev/cli/version) | `v` | Outputs Angular CLI version. |
title: CLI Reference • Overview • Angular
description: The web development framework for building modern apps.
